item.description:
Greetings,

These are some really great workshops coming up with a Christian Master Teacher, Mother Clare Watts, author of 'Giving Birth to God: a woman's path to enlightenment.'


The Joy Of Being Single~ Thursday Feb 15th 7:30p $25 In our overly romanticized world, few people feel happy being single. The great secret is that single life can be filled with joy, freedom and connection. Being a woman or a man unto oneself can be both liberating and fulfilling.

Spiritual Parenting~ Friday Feb 16th 7:30p $25 Parents often feel an innate obligation to teach their children about spirituality. Leading your child through the developmental stages of growth with spiritual consciousness is one of the greatest joys and challenges that you will ever have.

How to Find and Keep a Mate~ Saturday, Feb 17th 10a~1:30p $30 light lunch included Do you want a mate who shares your desire for a spiritually based life? If you are hoping for a spiritually connected and aware relationship, or want to introduce more spirituality into your current relationship, please join us. This workshop will stretch your understanding of a spiritually connected union.

@ The Center of Light~Boston 97 Perkins St. Jamaica Plain 617-852-2822
item.name: Seminar: How to find and keep a mate
